net.theblackchamber.crypto.providers

Class AESEncryptionProvider

  • java.lang.Object
    • net.theblackchamber.crypto.providers.EncryptionProvider<javax.crypto.SecretKey>
      • net.theblackchamber.crypto.providers.AESEncryptionProvider

  • public class AESEncryptionProvider
extends EncryptionProvider<javax.crypto.SecretKey>
    Provider which will allow for encryption and decryption of strings using the AES algorithm.
    Usage: SecretKey key = KeystoreUtils.getAESSecretKey(keyfile, "aes-key", "TEST"); AESEncryptionProvider encryptionProvider = new AESEncryptionProvider(key); String cipherText = encryptionProvider.encode("clear text");
